title: Practical Competency Enhancement Through Learning Design and Analytical Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Focused on practitioners designing learning models based on real work cases and managing complexity using analytical tools

learning_goals: One can compare and explain three core model types of Learning Design (LD) and Learning Analytics (LA)
By applying a model-based approach to real educational scenarios, learning complexity can be reduced by over 20%
One can visualize data generated during project processes using learning analytics tools and propose improvement strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
